body_html: OK, I rewrite my code and retrain it, but as others said, 0.3.0 on cpu is obviously slower than 0.1 (about 20~30%). I hope 0.4 can balance both cpu and gpu. I can only use cpu at present because my code need a large memory which gpu cannot hold.

body: OK, I rewrite my code and retrain it, but as others said, 0.3.0 on cpu is obviously slower than 0.1 (about 20~30%). I hope 0.4 can balance both cpu and gpu. I can only use cpu at present because my code need a large memory which gpu cannot hold.
